text:
I’m deeply saddened by the loss of Charlie Kirk. He was a gifted speaker, principled, and cared for America’s youth. Most importantly, he was a husband and father who was taken far too soon. 

Praying for his family this evening, and for an end to political violence in America.

It was a pleasure to welcome @EDSecMcMahon to Michigan for a roundtable with charter school leaders from our state. We discussed what schools are doing to confront learning loss and how school choice policies empower parents. Thank you for joining me, Madam Secretary!
The rescissions package will allow NPR to be fully independent, and saves taxpayers billions of dollars.

In 2023, @NPR stopped posting on X after being labeled "government-funded media," claiming the taxpayer support it receives is less than 1% of its annual budget. Today, NPR is claiming losing these funds would completely dismantle the organization.

https://t.co/H4uSeLJPgI

The CCP seeks to influence universities with funding from organizations & individuals. Make no mistake these gifts tie back to China’s Communist government. This has no place on campus & we must end this foreign influence. UM should disclose all foreign gifts and follow the law.

The WHO repeatedly failed the world in its response to COVID-19, spreading false information about the virus at the behest of the CCP. 

Proud to join @RepTiffany on this critical legislation to ensure future presidents cannot submit our nation to the WHO's corrupt guidance.

President Trump has been consistent. A nuclear Iran poses a grave threat to our nation, our military, and our allies. His decision to strike Iran is necessary to keep us and our allies safe, and ensure the largest sponsor of terror in the world does not develop nuclear weapons.

Israel has every right to defend itself against those who wish to destroy it. A nuclear Iran poses a critical threat to the United States and our allies, and puts American military personnel in the Middle East at risk. I stand with Israel as it confronts this threat, and it would be a mistake for the Iranian regime to target American servicemembers in retaliation.

Duke Kunshan University’s website promotes Chinese military training. It is outrageous an American university would lend its name to training the military of a foreign adversary. @RepWalberg and I are calling for @DukeU to close DKU immediately. https://t.co/ktsEhsbBNR

My colleagues from Michigan and I have worked diligently to secure a new mission. This is another win for our state as the administration ends its first 100 days. 

Thank you @POTUS!

Selfridge Air National Guard Base is crucial to Michigan's economy and our national security. Today, President Trump recognized the role it plays in keeping our country safe, announcing the base will be home to the new F-15EX Eagle II fighter mission.

https://t.co/3F78ItgM1w
The House Select Committee on the CCP and the Senate Special Committee on Aging are live!
I am grateful to be joined by my colleagues from Michigan, @RepWalberg, @RepHuizenga, @RepJackBergman, @RepLisaMcClain, @RepJames, and @RepTomBarrett.

This week, Secretary of State  Benson reported more illegally cast ballots were counted in our election results. This is unacceptable. I called on Sec. Benson to explain this failure, and her opposition to election integrity measures like the SAVE Act.

https://t.co/xDuwrp9mGw

Today, I joined @MariaBartiromo on @FoxBusiness to talk the threats posed by the CCP, how the Trump admin is looking to counter them, TikTok, and false reports that Elon Musk is receiving top-secret briefings from the Pentagon. Watch my interview here.
https://t.co/8qPCd9QV31

The U.S. should not tolerate a compromise on the sale of TikTok. The app's CCP-affiliated ownership poses a threat to our national security, and the future of the tech industry. The law is clear - any deal on TikTok must eliminate the CCP's influence and control of the app.

Read my op-ed on TikTok in @NRO below.
https://t.co/NYHMRfOuhV
Thank you to cosponsors @RepJackBergman, @RepBentz, @RepRickCrawford, @RepWebster, @RepHuizenga, @RepMeuser, @RepScholten, @RepFrankLucas, @RepNewhouse, @RepLaHood, and @RepRussFulcher.

I have met with sixth-generation Michigan farmers who fear that unless something changes with how this wage rate is calculated at @USDOL, they will be the last in their family to farm. My bill will help them maintain a reliable and legal workforce, while still making ends meet.

Yesterday, I introduced a bipartisan bill to provide relief for farmers. For 12 years farmers across Michigan have been subjected to unsustainable wage mandates by the Dept. of Labor. My Supporting Farm Operations Act will help them stay in business.

https://t.co/unId3kgRgW

The Chinese Communist Party has long sought to manipulate international bodies and misrepresent Taiwan’s status for its own gain. We must ensure that Beijing’s distortion of history does not go unchallenged, and that Taiwan’s sovereignty is respected on the world stage.

@EasternMichU @oaklandu President Taylor @DetMercy has personally expressed cooperation on this matter. I look forward to hearing from him further as he protects the advanced technologies at UDM’s Center for Automotive Systems Engineering and ends UDM’s connections to four Chinese schools.

@EasternMichU @oaklandu @OaklandU has NSA-designated cybersecurity programs that share six key personnel members with Oakland’s joint institute with Zhengzhou University. This channels U.S. taxpayer dollars into programs that could help the PRC develop cyber tools to use against us.

@EasternMichU @OaklandU partners with three Chinese universities that all want to advance national defense technologies for the Chinese military. At the same time, Oakland has received more than $2.5 million from DOD for defense research.

@EasternMichU @EasternMichU also partners with Beibu Gulf University, an institution that trains wartime reserve forces for the Chinese military. This is not an institution an American university should be partnering with.

@EasternMichU’s GameAbove College receives federal funding for cybersecurity programs. At the same time, the college sends faculty to China to train Chinese students. Our nation faces unprecedented cyberattacks from the CCP. This collaboration must end.

In the letters @RepWalberg and I wrote as the chairmen of @EdWorkforceCmte and @committeeonccp, we detailed how the Chinese institutions involved have close ties to the Chinese military and how the joint institutes put taxpayer-funded research at risk.

https://t.co/0whB0ZTlCy

@RepWalberg and I are asking @EasternMichU, @OaklandU, and @DetMercy to end their joint institutes with Chinese universities. These partnerships jeopardize taxpayer-funded research and benefit the CCP. We hope the schools will end these joint institutes.

https://t.co/LFCWA66Ria
Look forward to working with @CongressmanRaja and all the members of the @committeeonccp.

Thank-you to @SenRickScott for introducing my NO GOTION Act in the Senate. The United States is in competition with the CCP and under no circumstance should CCP-affiliated companies like Gotion benefit  from the tax dollars of hardworking American families.

As well as @MikeKellyPA, @RepJoeWilson, @RepTimMooreNC, @RepEricBurlison, @DrNealDunnFL2, @RepTomBarrett, @RepMarkGreen, @RepFranklin, @RepNewhouse, @RepBuddyCarter, @RepJames, @RepMillsPress, @RepMikeLawler, @RepJohnMcGuire, and @RepBenCline.

Thank you for to cosponsors @TXRandy14, @RepAaronBean, @RepMeuser, @RepCiscomani, @VernBuchanan, @RepDaleStrong, @repdarrellissa, @RepRileyMoore, @RepKatCammack, @RepJackBergman, @RepNancyMace, @RepJuliaLetlow, @RepMMM, @RepMcCormick, and @RepFitzgerald.

I am proud to introduce this resolution recognizing parents' rights in education with Chairman @RepWalberg, @RepBurgessOwens, and @SenatorTimScott. You can read our resolution honoring parents, students, and teachers here. 

https://t.co/qrMCj4faSC

I have introduced legislation designating this week as National School Choice Week. Parents and students deserve the chance to pursue the best education available to them. #SchoolChoice gives students the opportunity to achieve their highest potential. https://t.co/Dy1Usbrec2
Thank you to @RepLaHood, @RepGolden, and @SenRickScott for joining me in introducing this legislation!

This is unacceptable. My bill closes that loophole and makes sure CCP-affiliated companies like Gotion will not be able to receive tax credits. We are in a competition with the CCP and under no circumstance should taxpayer dollars go to Chinese companies.

Today, I introduced my bipartisan NO GOTION Act to ensure companies beholden to our adversaries cannot qualify for green energy tax credits. Currently, the Inflation Reduction Act contains a loophole that lets companies affiliated with the CCP collect American tax dollars. 

https://t.co/9UKL7f6aQt

This includes money for @Gotion48660 and @catl_official, which have clear ties to the Chinese Communist Party. If @GovWhitmer is serious about stopping the CCP from taking over our auto industry, she will end the subsidies she approved. Until then, her words are empty.

Today, @GovWhitmer spoke at the Detroit Auto Show and made hypocritical remarks about the risk of Chinese auto suppliers subsidized by the CCP coming to Michigan. The fact is she has given hundreds of millions of taxpayer dollars to Chinese auto suppliers.
.@SenMarcoRubio will be an outstanding Secretary of State!

The results of these collaborations could one day be turned against our country, and we cannot allow that to happen.  American universities should end these types of joint institutes and protect the security of our nation’s research.

.@UMich is making the right decision in ending its joint institute with a Chinese university, and more of our nation’s universities should follow its action. The @committeeonccp has put a spotlight on the fact that too many American universities are collaborating with CCP researchers on critical technologies. https://t.co/04wnpvmU2A
Thank for the invitation and opportunity to meet with your group earlier this week. This disease steals our loved ones from us and I have worked in Congress to fund research that will stop it.
Congratulations @RepLisaMcClain!
Democrats in Lansing have given Gotion $715 million in taxpayer support and now this Biden-Harris policy will  let Chinese companies collect billions more from hardworking Michigan families.

Today’s announcement by the Treasury  Department leaves the door wide open for Gotion and other Chinese  companies to receive federal tax credits. It is a disgraceful policy  that will take money from hardworking Michigan families and funnel it  straight to Beijing while forcing our Michigan automakers to become more  dependent on supply chains controlled by China.

It has been two weeks since five Chinese nationals who studied @UMich were charged with spying on Camp Grayling. More action is needed from @GovWhitmer following this incident. https://t.co/En6u5VuyQZ
WATCH: @RepLaHood and I host a roundtable in Manteno, Illinois about @Gotion48660's plans in the state and its disturbing relationship with the Chinese Communist Party. https://t.co/vyq8UJX3xJ
American universities must realize they are a target for espionage and protect the critical taxpayer-funded research they do.

As chairman of the Select Committee on the CCP, I recently issued a report on research at our nation’s universities. All of our universities must shut down their joint institutes with Chinese universities, and enact stricter guardrails on emerging technology research.

The CCP obviously has an interest in Camp Grayling and this is further evidence it would be a mistake for Michigan leaders to allow Gotion to build in our state. State funding for Gotion’s plan to bring Chinese nationals to Mecosta County is an open invitation for more spying.

This case shows once again that CCP espionage can happen anywhere in America and we must be vigilant. For national security reasons, Governor Whitmer and the legislature must revoke state funding for Gotion immediately.

https://t.co/HeQPsKMR7U
